title: My friend cant register a new account, everything works but at the third step it doesnt go on
body:
"Everything works but at the third step it doesn't go on even doing all it asks me to do (Username, password). I've tried many times to change username or browser but nothin happen"
A hand would be appreciated, thanks in advance!

replies.body: Tell him to try again. There were some problems with the server today, it might be the cause of it.
